JobTitle: Paralegal/Sr. Paralegal, Government Investigations & Special Matters
JobFullDesc: About the Role  At Uber, we pride ourselves on the amazing team we’ve built. We’re seeking a Senior Paralegal who has the same passion for excellence. This role is part of Uber’s Government Investigations & Special Matters team, the legal team that responds to government and regulatory inquiries and investigations on behalf of the company. The team intersects with all other legal teams at Uber, including litigation, compliance, employment, privacy, insurance, corporate, antitrust and competition, and our regional teams, and serves all business lines, including Mobility, Delivery, and Freight.   At Uber, paralegals are entrusted with significant substantive work, both internally and public-facing, and tasked with classic matter support and organization. We are looking for an experienced, ambitious, detail-oriented paralegal who can help us provide efficient support to the business. What You'll DoSupport internal and external investigations,
